description: Non-material amendments to planning permission 17/0718 as follows:Private terrace north of block SW05 added South Way footpath and lay-by - paving type changed to tarmac (P11) Removal of paving type P3 and replacement with Paving type P2 - Concrete block paving Paving type P16 - concrete block paving added as 'doormat paving' Kerb type K2 - Granite kerb types K2 changed to concrete kerb Additional Brick wall (W2) north of block SW03B Brick wall north of block SW04 removed Introduction of granite clad wall (W3) north of block SW03B Removal of hedges (H1) north of blocks SW03B and SW04  Extension of Eastern residential garden (between block SW04 and SW05) towards South Private terraces: Change from P5 clay paving (4 colour mix) to P9 clay paving (one colour) Paving type P30 (Sand Surfacing) to sandpit Planter PLA1 -  Sheet pile planter changed to timber sleeper planter Redesign of formal play elements (PE2) Hedges along private terraces on Eastern fa‡ade of block SW03B, and part of Eastern and part of Western fa‡ade of block SW04 replaced by 1.1m high timber fences (F3)  Hedges along private terraces on Northern fa‡ades of blocks SW03b, SW04 and SW05, and on part of Eastern fa‡ade of block SW04 and part of Western fa‡ade of block SW04 replaced by 1.1m high steel vertical bar railing (BL2) TS (timber screen divider) replaced by F4 (1.5m high timber divider) on Eastern fa‡ade of block SW03b TS (timber screen divider) replaced by F5 (1.5m high steel vertical bar divider) on Northern and Eastern fa‡ade of block SW04 Size of cycle shelter south of block SW05 increased in size Step access from block SW03B and SW04 car park removed (access now from phase 1) Private terrace added below residential garden level east of block SW04  Sloped landscape (1 in 3 slope) changed to terraced landscape with reduced tree planting and Ecological under-storey planting (PL3) replaced by PL4 Wildflower meadow Maintenance path removed south of blocks SW03B, SW04 and SW05 Filter trench to southern boundary  Green roof areas to blocks SW03B, SW04 and SW05 altered to brown roofs Addition of louvre to generator room on west elevation of block SW04
site_name: Land Surrounding Wembley Stadium Station, South Way, Wembley
